attributes.action: Send immediate air asset to Panjshir Afghanistan. Support the last stand.
attributes.additional_details:
We owe it to every service personal we’ve lost, every person maimed, we owe it to our allies we have abandoned and we owe it ourselves and our children. 
We must act now, and by our own standards and values must not sit idle whilst the Taliban slaughter the innocent.
attributes.background: Immediately send air asset resources to support the ground fight in panjshir the last standing province of Afghanistan.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Redeploy UK Forces to Afghanistan to protect the citizens against the Taliban: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594823

Help the people of Afghanistan: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594723

If you want to request a different action you would need to provide your full name when you start your petition.
